channel.title: Server help
channel.description: Well i had just released my server and went away but my cousin was running my server for me on my cpu he keep posting come buy staff on serverstatus and i think my server was banned so know i have no one who will come on how can i fix this

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Well, I wouldn’t recommend posting anywhere but Server Status.

If your account was banned, It’s probably an Infraction of a server post you made. What MAY help, Is posting the server Internet Protocol in your signature, or maybe go on a forums that have a lot of members and support advertising.
You may be able to post an advertisement in the General Category of http://www.moparisthebest.com/
But I still mainly recommend waiting for you to be un-banned or contact a forum administrator to discuss your penalty and consequence.
Hope this helped!
~.Tony.~

Read full topic
